[[Club'in]] {{Extra album cover | Upper caption = Alternative cover | Type = studio | Cover = Ruslana - Wild Dances romanian edition album cover.jpg | Lower caption = Romanian edition }} {{Extra album cover | Upper caption = Alternative cover |Type=studio | Cover = | Lower caption = Turkish edition }} {{Singles | Name = Wild Dances | Type = Studio album | single 1 = [[Wild Dances (song)|Wild Dances]] | single 1 date = 2004 | single 2 = [[Dance with the Wolves]] | single 2 date = January, 2005 | single 3 = [[The Same Star]] | single 3 date = May, 2005 }} }} {{Album ratings |rev1 = [[Allmusic]] |rev1score = (?)[{{Allmusic|class=album|id=r700325|pure_url=yes}} Allmusic review] |rev2 = ''[[Amazon.com]]'' |rev2score = (?)[http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0007MAKHO/ Amazon.com review] }} '''''Wild Dances''''' is a 2004 [[studio album]] by the [[Ukraine|Ukrainian]] [[singer]] and winner of the [[Eurovision Song Contest 2004|2004 Eurovision Song Contest]] [[Ruslana]]. The album has been certified 7x [[platinum album|platinum]] in Ukraine, selling 700,000+ copies. ==Track listing== ;Basic album {| class="wikitable" size=80% ! # !! Title !!
